title: WTB or Trade for T206-CHIEF MYERS FIELDING

posts.post_title: WTB or Trade for T206-CHIEF MYERS FIELDING
posts.post_content:
WTB or Trade for T206 Chief Myers Fielding with the following backs for my back run ,AB, Broadleaf, Cycle, and Tolstoi. Looking for nice examples Grade 2-3 or 4. If anyone has any for sale please LMK. I also have the following BACKS to trade . 

Tannehill -AB 460 PSA 3
Lennox-AB 350W/FRAME-PSA 3
Bescher Port-Cycle 350 PSA 3
Lord -Cycle 350 PSA 4
Freeman-Broadleaf -PSA 3
Elberfeld Fielding- Tolstoi PSA 3
Schlei Port- Tolstoi PSA 3.5

I Hope to knock one or two of these off my list in 2014.

Thanks 
John P

Hi, John.

Do you still have that Freeman Broadleaf?

Richard

Richard,
I still have the T206 Freeman BL350 PSA 3-

FYI-Still looking for a Chief Myers Feilding BL and Tolstoi. If anyone has one available please let me know.I have recently picked up the AB and Cycle...
